about_the_game:
THIS IS THE VR VERSION OF THE MUJINA GAME.

DESKTOP & VR PLAYERS CANNOT PLAY TOGETHER (SAME INPUT ONLY)

Mujina is a Maze Exploration game where the player has to activate 4 objective points and reach the end portal. Beware of the monsters and the numerous traps awaiting you! If everyone dies, it will result in a failure! Group up with your friends or anyone online to complete the 3 type of mazes!


The 3 types are the following :

The Procedural Maze : The path is generated automatically at the beginning of each session, so it will never be the same. Player has to activate the 4 hidden altars and reach the middle portals without dying from the traps and monsters roaming around!

The Maze : The main maze of the game has 4 different seasons; (Winter, Spring, Summer and Fall)! The more altars you activate, the harder it get! Each quarter has their own kind of traps or specifications & the path tends to move every 45 seconds! You must reach the middle portal once every altars are activated in order to succeed this level!

The Portal Maze : 1 Word. Disorienting. 4 Puzzles & 1 Final Gate. Will you make it?

Player can find items in the maze to help them succeed!

Red Glowsticks / Green Glowsticks & Purple Glowsticks : The glowsticks are really common and can be use to find your way back or mark certain areas!
The Flares : You lost your friend in the maze? No problem! Just use a flare to know each others locations!
The Fire's Blessing : This item can be used to regenerate your health bar and be invisible to monsters that are not currently chasing you for 15 seconds!
The Compass : This item will help you navigate through the mazes!
The Vanishing Wind : A powerful item that can only be found one time per maze. You can use it to make a monster disappear for good!
